title: Welcome to the Crusader Gaming Hub!
description:
Before you can access the server, we'll need to verify that you're a member of one of the following groups. You can react to this message with the appropriate emoji.

:purple_circle: - **Current Student**
:white_circle: - **Guest**
:yellow_circle: - **Prospective Student**
:blue_circle: - **Alumnus or Alumna**
